prompts: Create a robot-like Pokemon with metallic features and a powerful stance.
I want a Pokemon that looks like it has ancient origins and is made of stone.
Generate a humanoid Pokemon that combines steel and ghost elements in its design.
Make a Pokemon that channels the power of ancient machinery and has a blue color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that is both sturdy and mystical, with a design that suggests it can fly.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a tomb guardian, with striking turquoise accents.
Give me a Pokemon that showcases a blend of technology and nature in its appearance.
